premise_source_doc_sentence: Fisher wrote several semi-autobiographical novels , including Postcards from the Edge and the screenplay for the film of the book , as well as an autobiographical one-woman play , and its non-fiction book , Wishful Drinking , based on the play .

claim: Wishful Drinking is based on a television show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Joshua Ravetch is an American writer/director born in Los Angeles , California who co-created and directed Carrie Fisher 's one-woman show Wishful Drinking , which had a successful run on Broadway .

claim: Wishful Drinking is based on a television show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2009 , his work  (  both photography and textiles  )  was featured in the remodel of Carrie Fisher 's dressing room at Studio 54 for her production of Wishful Drinking .

claim: Wishful Drinking is based on a television show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Wishful Drinking is an autobiographical humor book by American actress and author Carrie Fisher , published by Simon & Schuster in 2008 .

claim: Wishful Drinking is based on a television show.
